summary: Comprehensive testing of ChciAI.cz redesign completed successfully. All major features working including 3D logo, Clawix callback form, chatbot widget, theme toggle, mobile responsiveness, and FAQ accordion.
passed_tests: Landing page loads without errors
3D 'Chci Ai' logo displays with gradient effect and animations
Theme toggle switches between light and dark mode successfully
Clawix callback form has all required fields (name, phone, website)
Language selection shows all 6 languages (cs, en, de, sv, vi, uk)
Call time selection shows all 4 options (30s, 5m, 30m, tomorrow)
Consent checkboxes for SMS and call are present and functional
Clawix callback form submission works and shows success message
Backend /api/clawix/callback endpoint works correctly
Chatbot widget opens and closes properly
Chatbot shows welcome message from Clawix
Quick replies work in chatbot
Manual message input and AI responses work
Mobile responsive design with hamburger menu works
Stats section shows animated counters
FAQ accordion expands/collapses properly
All navigation elements present and functional
Authentication endpoints working (register, login, me)
Contact callback endpoint working
SEO structured data endpoint working
